Company is the class that represent a company. A company is characterized by the following informations: A unique identifier assigned automatically. A name.

Computer - Class in com.excilys.model
Computer is the class that represent a computer. A computer is characterized by the following informations: A unique identifier assigned automatically. A name. An introduced date. A discontinued date. A company.
